targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(created)
FROM users

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  count(id) AS "id"
FROM trees_adopted
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  count(distinct(id))
FROM trees

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  count(distinct(tree_id)) AS "id"
FROM trees_adopted
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
  sum(CAST (amount AS INTEGER)) AS "Liter (Summe)"
FROM trees_watered
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(created,$__interval,NULL),
  count(uuid)
FROM users
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  count(created)
FROM users
where $__timeFilter(created)

SELECT
  count(*)
FROM users
where created <= $__timeTo()

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  count(timestamp) AS "id"
FROM trees_watered
where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  count(distinct(uuid)) AS "id"
FROM trees_watered
where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  count(distinct(tree_id)) AS "id"
FROM trees_watered
where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  sum(CAST (amount AS INTEGER)) AS "liter"
FROM trees_watered
where $__timeFilter(timestamp)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

select row_number() over(order by sum(CAST (tw.amount AS INTEGER)) desc) Rang, tw.username AS Benutzer, sum(CAST (tw.amount AS INTEGER)) as gegossen from trees_watered tw where $__timeFilter(tw.timestamp) group by tw.uuid, tw.username order by gegossen desc

select row_number() over(order by count(distinct(tree_id)) desc) AS Rang, username AS Benutzer, count(distinct(tree_id)) as baum_anzahl from trees_watered where $__timeFilter(timestamp) group by username having count(distinct(tree_id)) > 1 order by baum_anzahl desc

panels.title: Nutzer, die mehr als einen Baum gegossen haben

targets.rawSql: select row_number() over(order by count(*) desc) AS rang, username AS Benutzer, count(*) as giess_anzahl from trees_watered where $__timeFilter(timestamp) group by username having count(*) > 1 order by giess_anzahl desc

panels.title: Nutzer, die mehr als einmal gegossen haben

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  count(created)
FROM users
where created >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000'

SELECT
  count(*)
FROM users

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  count(timestamp) AS "id"
FROM trees_watered
where timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  count(distinct(uuid)) AS "id"
FROM trees_watered
where timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  count(distinct(tree_id)) AS "id"
FROM trees_watered
where timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__unixEpochGroupAlias(0,$__interval),
  sum(CAST (amount AS INTEGER)) AS "liter"
FROM trees_watered
where timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

select row_number() over(order by sum(CAST (tw.amount AS INTEGER)) desc) Rang, tw.username AS Benutzer, sum(CAST (tw.amount AS INTEGER)) as gegossen from trees_watered tw where tw.timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000' group by tw.uuid, tw.username order by gegossen desc

select row_number() over(order by count(distinct(tree_id)) desc) AS Rang, username AS Benutzer, count(distinct(tree_id)) as baum_anzahl from trees_watered where timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000' group by username having count(distinct(tree_id)) > 1 order by baum_anzahl desc

panels.title: Nutzer, die mehr als einen Baum gegossen haben

targets.rawSql: select row_number() over(order by count(*) desc) AS rang, username AS Benutzer, count(*) as giess_anzahl from trees_watered where timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000' group by username having count(*) > 1 order by giess_anzahl desc

panels.title: Nutzer, die mehr als einmal gegossen haben

targets.rawSql: select row_number() over(order by sum(CAST (tw.amount AS INTEGER)) desc) Rang, t.bezirk AS Ortsteil, sum(CAST (tw.amount AS INTEGER)) as gegossen from trees_watered tw join trees t on tw.tree_id = t.id where $__timeFilter(tw.timestamp) group by tw.uuid, t.bezirk order by gegossen desc

select row_number() over(order by count(distinct(tw.tree_id)) desc) AS Rang, bezirk AS Ortsteil, count(distinct(tw.tree_id)) as baum_anzahl from trees_watered tw join trees t on tw.tree_id = t.id where $__timeFilter(tw.timestamp) group by t.bezirk having count(distinct(tw.tree_id)) > 1 order by baum_anzahl desc

panels.title: Bäume nach Ortsteile, die mehr als einmal gegossen worden sind

targets.rawSql: select row_number() over(order by count(*) desc) AS rang, t.bezirk as Ortsteil, count(*) as giess_anzahl from trees_watered tw join trees t on tw.tree_id = t.id where $__timeFilter(tw.timestamp) group by t.bezirk having count(*) > 1 order by giess_anzahl desc, t.bezirk

select row_number() over(order by count(distinct(username)) desc) AS rang, t.bezirk as Ortsteil, count(distinct(username)) as nutzer_anzahl from trees_watered tw join trees t on tw.tree_id = t.id where $__timeFilter(tw.timestamp) group by t.bezirk order by nutzer_anzahl desc, t.bezirk

select row_number() over(order by count(*) desc) AS rang, t.bezirk as Ortsteil, tw.username, count(*) as giess_anzahl from trees_watered tw join trees t on tw.tree_id = t.id where $__timeFilter(tw.timestamp) group by t.bezirk, tw.username having count(*) > 1 order by giess_anzahl desc, t.bezirk

panels.title: Gießer mit Ortsteil nach Anzahl Gießungen

targets.rawSql: select row_number() over(order by sum(CAST (tw.amount AS INTEGER)) desc) Rang, t.bezirk AS Ortsteil, sum(CAST (tw.amount AS INTEGER)) as gegossen from trees_watered tw join trees t on tw.tree_id = t.id  where tw.timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000' group by tw.uuid, t.bezirk order by gegossen desc

select row_number() over(order by count(distinct(tw.tree_id)) desc) AS Rang, bezirk AS Ortsteil, count(distinct(tw.tree_id)) as baum_anzahl from trees_watered tw join trees t on tw.tree_id = t.id where tw.timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000' group by t.bezirk having count(distinct(tw.tree_id)) > 1 order by baum_anzahl desc

panels.title: Bäume nach Ortsteile, die mehr als einmal gegossen worden sind

targets.rawSql: select row_number() over(order by count(*) desc) AS rang, t.bezirk as Ortsteil, count(*) as giess_anzahl from trees_watered tw join trees t on tw.tree_id = t.id where tw.timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000' group by t.bezirk having count(*) > 1 order by giess_anzahl desc, t.bezirk

select row_number() over(order by count(distinct(username)) desc) AS rang, t.bezirk as Ortsteil, count(distinct(username)) as nutzer_anzahl from trees_watered tw join trees t on tw.tree_id = t.id where tw.timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000' group by t.bezirk order by nutzer_anzahl desc, t.bezirk

select row_number() over(order by count(*) desc) AS rang, t.bezirk as Ortsteil, tw.username, count(*) as giess_anzahl from trees_watered tw join trees t on tw.tree_id = t.id where tw.timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00.000' group by t.bezirk, tw.username having count(*) > 1 order by giess_anzahl desc, t.bezirk

panels.title: Gießer mit Ortsteil nach Anzahl Gießungen

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  amount::numeric::integer AS value
FROM trees_watered
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp")
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  t.id, t.standortnr, u.email, t.strname, t.pflanzjahr, t.gattung, t.artdtsch
FROM users u JOIN trees_adopted a ON a.uuid = u.uuid JOIN trees t ON t.id = a.tree_id
ORDER BY u.email

SELECT
  t.id as tree,
  tw.amount::numeric::integer as value,
  t.lat::numeric::float as latitude,
  t.lng::numeric::float as longitude
FROM trees_watered tw JOIN trees t ON tw.tree_id = t.id
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp)
select count(*) from trees where pflanzjahr IS NOT NULL AND pflanzjahr::int >= 2006 and pflanzjahr::int <= 2010

panels.title: Anzahl Bäume im Alter von 10 bis 15 Jahren
